isi:
You know, I’m 20 now, and life just feels... less colorful. I know some people say this is the best time of their lives, especially if they had a dark past. But for me, I’m starting to lose interest in the things I used to enjoy. I don’t get excited about stuff like I did when I was a kid...

Maybe it’s just part of growing up...

I don’t know, man. I’m scared of the future. MY DUMB FUCKING BRAIN STILL HOPES I’ll randomly meet a girl who’ll somehow save me, bring color back into my life, make me happy. Someone I can protect too and we’d just get through life together.

Sometimes, when we feel really sad, we might think we’re depressed. But remember, only a professional can truly diagnose depression. If you're struggling, please seek help. Talk to your parents, your friends, or anyone you trust. You're not alone, and you don’t have to face it all by yourself.

Please, don’t turn to things like porn or harmful distractions, it won’t make the pain go away; it only makes things worse.

Hold on to what truly matters to you. Even if you feel like no one cares, even if you think God has forgotten you, He hasn’t. He’s still there.

You are not hopeless. You are worth helping.
